name: deviceTemperatureSetting_increase
description: This function is used to increase the temperature setting of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase the temperature on.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to increase the temperature on.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: The amount by which to increase the temperature.
